name: holon
description: Leight-weight DSL-free dual-side composable reactive components
author: serapath <dev@serapath.de> (http://www.github.com/serapath)

scripts.jobs: #list jobs + description on how to start working on one + how to stop development
scripts.develop: #checkout job branch + stylus & watch & testem + how to stop development
scripts.deploy: #build + run all tests + git push if successful
scripts.release: #build, test all + if successful: semver + push with tags + npm publish, bower register, ....
scripts.build: node node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js SOURCE/index.js -o RELEASE/index.v$(cat package.json | grep version | grep -Po '(?<=version": ").*(?=")').bundle.js
scripts.watch: node node_modules/watchify/bin/cmd.js SOURCE/index.js -o RELEASE/index.v$(cat package.json | grep version | grep -Po '(?<=version": ").*(?=")').bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run watch #@TODO: Add startup of testem
